Reviews.Title: Worked nice for a long time but...
Reviews.Author: T. Hansen
Reviews.Content: This lock got a lot of use on our back door and we loved it.However, it went thru a lot of batteries.Now, even with new batteries, it's acting odd, like it needs to be re-programmed.On the plus side, it still works fine as a manual dead-bolt.

Reviews.Title: perfect
Reviews.Author: stevena
Reviews.Content: I have been using this product non-stop for three years and it has never failed me. This power supply costs a fraction of what big-box stores want. Highly recommended!
